text: ya ehle-lkitabi la taglu fi dinikum vela tekulu `ale-llahi ille-lhakk. inneme-lmesihu `ise-bnu meryeme rasulu-llahi vekelimetuh. elkaha ila meryeme veruhum minh. feaminu billahi verusulih. vela tekulu selaseh. intehu hayral lekum. inneme-llahu ilahuv vahid. subhaneh ey yekune lehu veled. lehu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vekefa billahi vekila
